name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Square Snake
description: Standard snake-eating game, chasing and eating small balls, the snake's body will grow longer and longer, be careful not to hit obstacles, do not bite their tail or body. Eat 50 small balls to get through. The DLC include full 10 missions

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Bomber the Ruby Magic
description: You found some prehistoric magic towers in the cave. Red gemstones emit red light balls that move in the air. You move forward carefully, don't touch these light balls, you'll get hurt. Once you've found the treasure, go to the next map quickly.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Bomber the Falling Stone
description: The cave looked like it was about to collapse, and the stones above my head began to fall. You will be hurt by being stoned, please be careful to move forward. Remember to destroy the enemy to get the keys, blow open the walls to get the treasure chest.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Pinball killer
description: You've been put into a huge billiard table by extraterrestary. They give you a gun that fires white billiards, which you must use to shoot down billiards of all other colors. But these billiards are so huge that they can easily crush you. The DLC include full 10 missions

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Bomber the Ruby Magic
description: You found some prehistoric magic towers in the cave. Red gemstones emit red light balls that move in the air. You move forward carefully, don't touch these light balls, you'll get hurt. Once you've found the treasure, go to the next map quickly.

name: Poker Chase
description: Texas hold 'em poker, with common gacha game thematics.

name: Moon Whistle
description:
Moon Whistle is a Japanese language freeware role-playing video game created with RPG Tsukūru 95. Mainly made by Kōichirō Takaki, also known as Kannazuki Sasuke, this game involves an adventure of a five-year-old kindergartner in a pseudo-Japanese city of the 1980s and 1990s.
In 2011 an updated version was released called Moon Whistle XP.

name: Another Moon Whistle: Kuzureteku Nyuudougumo
description: A spin-off of Moon Whistle, which was released in April 2003, it was developed using RPG Tsukūru 2000.

name: My Home Town
description: A tiny accident occur in modern Japanese town.

name: Fenakkumura Monogatari
description: Fenakkumura Monogatari is a "Legend of Zelda" style short game.

name: Dotsubo-chan
description:
Dotsubo-Chan tells the story of a young girl that is going to get married, but when the day of the wedding arrives, all thing are going wrong and she will have to fix all of them if she wants to arrive to the wedding and get married.

The goal of the game is to get to the end of the day and get married, to do that she will have the help of a strange creature that will help her is she follows the feng shi rules. In each part of the game the player will have to answer five questions to pass to the mini game stage, and to advance in the game the player will have to pass the minigame.

The most difficult part of the games is to pass the mini games, most of them are really difficult.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 2: Jack-O'
description: This allows the character Jack-O' to be used in-game.

name: The 13th Month
description: The famous fairy tale "Sleeping Beauty" is completely reimagined and redesigned as Visual Novel… With a demonic imagination and originality.

name: Tensen Nyannyan: Gekigyouban
description:
Tensen Nyannyan: Gekigyouban is a adventure mahjong game in which the player controls a young girl that will advance through the adventure playing mahjong games against other characters that she will encounter during the journey,

To advance in the game the player should win the mahjong games. The gameplay is the usual in a mahjong game and the game uses a first person perspective for the adventure and for the mahjong part.

name: Metroid Planets
description:
Metroid Planets is a Fan Remake of the 1986 Nintendo Entertainment System game Metroid created by vacantshade.

It updates Samus' movement and adds a saving system, among other features. The game is called Metroid Planets because of its multiple maps. Planet Zebeth is a remake of the original Metroid. Planet Novus is a whole new map with new bosses and new areas. Selecting Planet Enigma will bring you to a room creator and a map generator that uses those rooms to create a world. (If you go to the Discord linked in the game menu, you can download a room pack and upload your own rooms.) The game also has online multiplayer.

name: Mezase! Senkyu Ou
description: Playstation port of the arcade game Senkyuu.

name: Yuugen Gaisha Chikyuu Boueitai
description: Yuugen Gaisha Chikyuu Boueitai is a Strategy game, developed by Japan Art Media (JAM) and published by Media Rings, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Yume-Iroiro
description: Yume-Iroiro is a dating simulation game in the style of Tokimeki Memorial and other games, but in this game at the beginning the player can choose to be a male or a female character.

name: Loot Train
description: Loot Train is a procedurally generated game where you take control of a hooded thief, that has a will bent on robbery, in a train full of valuables. Progress through train cars to defeat colorful enemies, and weird bosses summoned by the Guild of Righteous Protectors, to stop your genocide!

name: Diner Bros Inc
description: Join the Bros once again as they defend their precious restaurant! Co-operate or compete against your friends in this frantic party game for up to 4 players. Beat quick sequences of crazy minigames, fight a mysterious villain, and collect gems. Quickly! Before time runs out!

name: Portal Knights: Legendary Edition
description: Fight the Hollow King and defend Elysia from the evil forces behind the Fracture! Adventure with friends through randomly-generated islands! Includes Portal Knights - the acclaimed cooperative, 3D sandbox action RPG - and 13 additional DLCs.

name: Sword Art Online: Alicization Lycoris - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes the following:

• Full Game
• Premium Pass which includes 2 Major Expansions and a Special Costume as a bonus
• Virtual currency : 200 SAO coins
